segments.text: The kitchen setup looks pretty standard at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's drying dishes by the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's running, filling up the basin quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water starts spilling over onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's using a stool to access the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing from the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems a bit off-balance though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window shows a nice garden view outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back for the light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's forming under the woman's feet unseen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a busy, everyday moment with hidden issues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the plate in her hands is shiny now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a slice of family life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies look homemade and delicious.
segments.speaker: PAR
